summary: Patches inconsistencies between Requiem and Immersive Jewelry, with support for Requiem Behind the Curtain
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]What does this mod do?[/b]
[/size][/color]
It offers some very basic compatibility between [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64283/?]Immersive Jewelry[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem Overhaul[/url] while offering support for popular Requiem addition [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74330/?]Behind the Curtain[/url]. 

[b]DISCLAIMER! The mod Immersive Jewelry is not altogether roleplay friendly with Requiem and will add thousands of economy-breaking gems and jewelry that will make the game easier. Do not download this patch if you don't want this major change to your game. This patch only resolves inconsistencies between IJ and Requiem. It does not even begin the bridge the vast gulf of riches that would require major systematic edits to the IJ mod to reduce overall gem and jewelry prices. At 6.9 MB for the esp file alone, IJ is one of the largest mods in 32-bit Skyrim.

[/b]Note that [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] and its companion[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61569/?] Requiem patch[/url] touch some records that mine does. If you wish, you may load the Requiem patch after mine if you want to retain CCOR records, or simply load mine after the Requiem patch. The CCOR patch carries over records from the main mod with a focus on preserving that mod's functionality and not Reqtifying many records like weight and value. Either way, the choices should not be significant.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Which file do I need?[/b][/size][/color]

If you're simply running Requiem then choose the main file. If you're running Behind the Curtain, choose the second file. If you're using Immersive Sounds Compendium you can download that one. Only choose one file.

I'm listing this file as a [b]BETA[/b] patch because of the extensive changes. I would like feedback if anything breaks.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]What's my load order?[/b][/size][/color]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp
Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade.esp (If applicable)
Immersive Jewelry.esp
Requiem.esp
Requiem - Bugsmasher Edition.esp
Requiem - Behind the Curtain.esp (If applicable)
COR-CraftingOverhaulReqtified.esp (If applicable. Load below my patch if you want CCOR records to win)
Requiem - Immersive Jewelry.esp OR
Requiem - Immersive Jewelry BTC.esp (NOT BOTH)
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp

[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]What's in this patch?[/b][/size][/color]

A basic breakdown:

[b]Armor (44 edits)[/b]

* Changed values to Requiem consistency
* Changed weights to Requiem consistency
* Changed armor rating to Requiem consistency
* Carried over keywords from IJ
* Changed descriptions to Requiem consistency
* Carried over model file paths from IJ
* Carried over Requiem template armor

[b]Crafting (23 edits)[/b]

* Changed crafting requirements according to Requiem consistency

[b]Container (19 edits)[/b]

* Carried over loot lists from Requiem
* Kept vendors consistent with Requiem

[b]Object Effect (1 edit)[/b]

* Made the Gauldur Amulet consistent with Requiem buffs

[b]Ingredient (2 edits)[/b]

* Changed value and weight of pearls to Requiem consistency

[b]Leveled Lists (43 edits)[/b]

* Most leveled lists have been merged so players will find Requiem and IJ materials
* Removed Ebony, Orcish, Glass and other high level gear from IJ leveled lists

[b]Magic Effects (16 edits)[/b]

* Changed magic effects from items to be consistent with Requiem

[b]Misc Items (30 edits)
[/b]
* Changed values to Requiem consistency
* Changed weights to Requiem consistency
* Changed descriptions to Requiem consistency

[b]NPCs (6 edits)[/b]

* Changed 3 Alikr Warriors, Queen Potema and her remains, and Salma to carry over Requiem's perks, configuration, and skills.
* Carried over IJ items

[b]Weapons (31 edits)[/b]

* Changed values to Requiem consistency
* Changed damages to Requiem consistency
* Changed descriptions to Requiem consistency
* Carried over keywords from Requiem
author: vram1974
